title: Uber
description: Uber, a prominent brand in the transportation industry, adopts a modern and sleek aesthetic in its design. The color palette includes a deep midnight blue (09091A), a soft silver tone (C0C0C8), and a vibrant aqua blue (1FBAD6), which together convey a sense of innovation and reliability. These color guidelines are publicly available from Uber's design resources, as detailed in their official guide for developers.
